Question: Which songs are part of the soundtrack for the movie 'Jeena Sirf Merre Liye' released in 2002?
Options:
A. A) Jeena Sirf Mere Liye and Allah Allah
B. B) Tum Hi Ho and Tera Ban Jaunga
C. C) Chura Liya Hai Tumne Jo Dil Ko and Mehndi Hai Yaa
D. D) Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham and Kal Ho Naa Ho
Answer: A) Jeena Sirf Mere Liye and Allah Allah

Question: Which of the following songs is featured in the 2002 movie 'Jeena Sirf Merre Liye' along with 'Kaash Ke Tujhse Main Kabhi Milta'?
Options:
A. Tujhe Dekha To
B. Jeena Sirf Merre Liye
C. Chura Liya Hai Tumne
D. Tum Hi Ho

Question: In the 2002 movie 'Jeena Sirf Merre Liye', which two songs from the soundtrack became major hits?
Options:
A. Dil Hai Tumhaara
B. Jeena Sirf Mere Liye and Ek Baar To India
C. Chura Liya Hai Tumne Jo Dil Ko
D. Tujhe Dekha To
Answer: Jeena Sirf Mere Liye and Ek Baar To India

Question: In the 2002 movie 'Jeena Sirf Merre Liye', which two songs feature the singers Babul Supriyo and Kavita Krishnamurthy?
Options:
A. A. Tu Hai Sola and Kaash Ke Tujhse Main Kabhi Milta
B. B. Tumse Milne Ki Tamanna and Tera Hone Laga Hoon
C. C. Jaane Dil Mein and Tum Hi Ho
D. D. Mere Haath Mein and Mera Jahan
Answer: A. Tu Hai Sola and Kaash Ke Tujhse Main Kabhi Milta

Question: In the 2002 movie 'Jeena Sirf Merre Liye', which song from the soundtrack became a major hit, featuring the lyrics 'Tu Hai Sola'?
Options:
A. Dil Hai Tumhara
B. Tu Hai Sola
C. Chura Liya Hai Tumne Jo Dil Ko
D. Tera Hone Laga Hoon

Question: Which two songs are part of the soundtrack for the movie 'Jeena Sirf Merre Liye' released in 2002?
Options:
A. Pyaar Maange and Ek Baar To India
B. Dil Laga Liya and Chura Liya
C. Tumse Milne Ki Tamanna and Tera Hone Laga Hoon
D. Kabhi Alvida Naa Kehna and Mitwa
Answer: Pyaar Maange and Ek Baar To India

Question: In the 2002 movie 'Jeena Sirf Merre Liye', which song features the singer Anuradha Sriram and shares a connection with the song 'Ek Baar To India'?
Options:
A. Dupatta
B. Chura Liya Hai Tumne Jo Dil Ko
C. Tera Hone Laga Hoon
D. Tum Se Hi
